title: Metal Slug - ALI213
description:
Metal Slug
The first game in the series, I might upload some of the others that were released on steam but I gotta find & test first.

NOTE: This game does not work for XP & older.
It officially only supports Windows Vista/7/8 but I'm using it just fine on Windows 10.
I couldn't find update 1 for this game, so you could expect some bugs.

Instructions
You only need to extract and play the game by launching the exe in the Metal Slug folder but I'd recommend following the instructions below for a better experience.

1. Extract using Winrar or 7-zip
2. Cut Metal Slug folder to C:Program Files
3. Now into C:Program FilesMetal Slug , right click mslug1.exe and send to desktop. Do this twice.
4. Rename Metal slug desktop shortcut to Metal Slug and drag it into C:ProgramDataMicrosoftWindowsStart MenuPrograms
5. Rename the other shortcut on desktop to Metal Slug

If you're using an xbox 360 controller, I'd recommend using my controller layout. You'll need to start the game once and then exit. Then simply copy paste UserDefault.xml into Metal SlugProfileUserSaves
My layout is:
A = Jump
X = Shoot
B = Grenade

The game has a bug whereby it doesn't let you remap the buttons via the settings menu, you have to edit UserDefault.xml


7z Compressed size = 36.3 MB~
Uncompressed size = 70 MB~
